name: Word Combinations Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Verb meaning 'shrivel or dry up' 
+ a kind of eating utensil 
= what last name of the leading actress in 'Pleasantville'?

Word meaning 'while' 
+ synonym for 'confident' 
= what word meaning 'to determine'?

Noun meaning 'a person or animal's lower limb, used for walking' 
+ word meaning 'finish' 
= what word meaning an exaggerated folktale handed down through the years?

Preposition meaning 'coming from' 
+ word meaning 'number coming after nine' 
= what word meaning 'frequently'?

A noun meaning 'a route through mountains' 
+ a word indicating oldness 
= what word meaning 'a quotation from a speech or writing'?

A kind of tool used to hold cloth together in sewing 
+ a one-letter article meaning 'an' 
+ a warning cry in golf 
= what sleeveless, apronlike garment for girls?

A primary color 
+ the dwelling of a wild animal 
= what word meaning 'to blush'?

A kind of car favored by soccer moms 
+ a building security official 
= what name for the front part of an army, a word which can also refer to the leaders of a movement?

An adjective meaning 'plump' 
+ the female equivalent of 'him' 
= what word meaning a male parent?

A verb meaning 'to exist' 
+ a verb meaning 'to possess' 
= what word meaning 'to act in a certain way'?
